meta.title: Gmail Investor CRM Workflow
meta.goal: Extract investor information from emails and add to CRM
meta.purpose: Automated workflow for processing investor inquiries from Gmail into Airtable CRM

nodes.label: Navigate and Log in to Gmail
nodes.intent: Complete Gmail authentication process using stored credentials for email and password entry, including navigation and login confirmation.
nodes.context: This compound task handles the complete Gmail login workflow using credentials from the credential management system. The system will automatically substitute {{gmail_email}} and {{gmail_password}} placeholders with the user's stored credentials. Uses robust Stagehand .act() commands for reliable automation.

nodes.label: Navigate to Gmail Login
nodes.intent: Navigate to the Gmail login page to begin authentication.
nodes.context: Open Gmail in the browser. Direct navigation to the Google accounts login page for Gmail service.

actions.instruction: Wait for login page to fully load

nodes.label: Enter Email and Click Next
nodes.intent: Input the Gmail email address and proceed to password step.
nodes.context: Use Stagehand .act() for robust email entry and Next button clicking. This handles dynamic page layouts and various login UI variations.

actions.instruction: Enter the email address {{gmail_email}} in the email field and click Next to proceed
Wait for transition to password step

nodes.label: Enter Password and Sign In
nodes.intent: Input the Gmail password and complete the login process.
nodes.context: Use Stagehand .act() for robust password entry and sign-in button clicking. Handles various password field presentations and button variations.

actions.instruction: Enter the password {{gmail_password}} in the password field and click Next or Sign in to complete login

nodes.label: Verify Login Success
nodes.intent: Confirm successful login and wait for Gmail inbox to load.
nodes.context: Wait for successful authentication and redirect to Gmail inbox. Handle any additional verification steps if needed.

actions.instruction: Wait for successful login and redirect to Gmail inbox
If prompted for additional verification or 2FA, handle it appropriately or wait for manual intervention
Wait for Gmail inbox to fully load

nodes.label: Scan Email List
nodes.intent: Visually scan the email list to identify potential investor-related emails.
nodes.context: Look through the email list in the inbox to find emails that might contain investor information, inquiries, or business opportunities.

actions.instruction: Scan the email list for subject lines and senders that might indicate investor-related content

nodes.label: Process Each Investor Email
nodes.intent: For each identified investor email, extract information and add to CRM.
nodes.context: This loop processes each investor-related email found in the inbox.

nodes.label: Select Investor Email
nodes.intent: Click on an unprocessed investor email to open it.
nodes.context: Select and open the next investor email that needs to be processed.

actions.instruction: Click on the first unprocessed investor email in the list

nodes.label: Extract Investor Information
nodes.intent: Read and extract key investor details from the email content.
nodes.context: Parse the email content to identify investor name, company, contact information, investment interests, and other relevant details.

actions.instruction: Extract investor information from email content

nodes.label: Open Airtable CRM
nodes.intent: Navigate to the Airtable CRM using stored base ID and authenticate with API key if needed.
nodes.context: Access the Airtable database where investor information is stored and managed. Uses {{airtable_base_id}} from credentials to construct the correct URL and {{airtable_api_key}} for authentication if prompted.

actions.instruction: Navigate to Airtable CRM using stored base ID
Wait for Airtable base to load
If prompted for API authentication, use stored API key

nodes.label: Add Investor to CRM
nodes.intent: Create a new record in Airtable with the extracted investor information.
nodes.context: Fill out the investor information form in Airtable with the details extracted from the email.

actions.instruction: Click the 'Add Record' or '+' button to create a new investor entry

nodes.label: Mark Email as Processed
nodes.intent: Return to Gmail and mark the email as processed to avoid reprocessing.
nodes.context: Go back to Gmail and add a label or flag to indicate this email has been processed.
